title: HELP!!!!!!!!
body: I got another account weeks ago. Yesterday after I logged off and I just searched my match history on opgg but it said smth like 'the summoner name doesnt exist'. The name before was 'FobGromp' and I changed it to Kevvv. I searched FobGromp and I saw my match history. Then I couldnt log in and I tried to get my password by email but I didnt receive it on my email. Today in the morning opgg told me FobGromp doesnt exist so I was wondering if my acc got hacked and that %%%% hacked my email as well and I also guessed if my account got banned because of some reasons. I dont really know what just happened so can I get help by riot please.

replies.body: now I made sure that guy didnt hack my account and email but anyone knows how do I get the password back without email?
